cause.description:
In the year 2024 Amyn will be 25 years old. As a proud Canadian he wants help people in this country - and other countries. He is not sure how to do that yet, but one dominant idea is to become Prime Minister of Canada. Visit www.amyn.ca "This page is for my ideas and dreams for my part in, and for, this great country."
1. I would like everybody in Canada, and the rest of the world, to live in peace. There is too much war, poverty and suffering. As the Prime Minister, I
2. Poverty must be eliminated.
3. visit www.amyn.ca
cause.mission: Campaign to elect Amyn Mawani as Prime Minister of Canada in 2024
cause.name: Amyn Mawani for Prime Minister 2024
